item.title: This vehicle is blocking the road, 6th October
item.description:
Forsd fiesta abandoned in the middle of the road from Friday, police is not doing literally nothing about it despite are aware. The vehicle is damaged so I wasn't able to move it. Is a carnage in the morning with the school run, plus tomorrow the dust kart wont be able to pass trough.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woolacombe Road, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: DANGEROUS dumped on pothole, 6th October

item.title: Alley way full of debris, 6th October
item.description:
Alley way on Parkside Avenue is full of debris/conkers fallen from the trees. The conkers make it hard to push a pram up the alley as the pathway is full as you can see from the pictures. Please could the alley be cleared

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parkside Avenue, Southborough, London

item.title: A resident called that someone has locked the gate of their Estate and there is a car that is trying to go out. Can we please look into this urgently., 6th October

item.title: Unemptied street bin, 6th October
item.description:
Yet again bin located at 51 bus stop o/s 14 hook lane remained unemptied over weekend . Resulting in litter build up ( and people trying to add more into it ) and fox interest overnight . Last time this was reported took 4 days for action to happen , why can’t this be monitored more efficiently ????

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hook Lane, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet
